reviewText: It made me think it was from before the Hubble was fixed; fuzzy and out of focus. I have seen other Hubble pictures that are dazzling and mesmerizing in digital detail.

Delightful images of the universe beyond our own small blue planet.  Size looses all meaning.  And beauty is redefined.  I was a very successful artist right up until I retired, and nothing I was exposed to could match the beauty of creation.
Even though the pictures were very good, Was very disappointed that there was no audio.  An expert astronomer would be OK but at my level, I was lost on most of the images.

This video is only pictures of space with music playing.  Some of the pictures have a caption saying what galaxy or nebula it is but that's it. I did not watch the whole thing, I got bored after ten minutes. The shots from the Hubble telescope are cool. The picture quality was not great and it didn't fill the width of my
monitor. Maybe after ten minutes of music there is a narrator but I doubt it.  These shots would make a cool screen saver.
We are very interested in outer space and would have appreciated commentary instead of "mood music". This was nothing more than a slide show. A cheap way to sell pictures of the Hubble spacecraft.

Good product and service.

  Thank you, Bill

What awesome pictures of space!  The music wasn't my favorite but just turn the sound off and play a CD you like if that's an issue.  My kids sat in amazment to what God has made in outer space.  A great discussion starter for what the beauty of Heaven will be like!
